LanguageData.ARA_NutrientNetworkTower.label: Arachnae Nutrient Supply Tower
LanguageData.ARA_NutrientNetworkTower.description: The central nutrient supply facility. It automatically refuels linked structures that require nutrients. The main body must be manually refueled with a large amount of biomass.
LanguageData.ARA_GrowthVat.label: Arachnae Digestion Cocoon
LanguageData.ARA_GrowthVat.description: A cocoon used by the Arachnae swarm to store and digest prey. Subjects placed in the cocoon are gradually dissolved by acid, providing additional biomass transport efficiency and hatching speed to the Arachnae Nutrient Supply Tower network. A maximum of 15 Digestion Cocoons can be active within one network.
LanguageData.ARANutrientDispenser.label: Arachnae Honeycomb Nest
LanguageData.ARANutrientDispenser.description: A nest that produces Arachnae Honeycomb Cake. It breaks down Insect Honey to create edible Honeycomb Cake. Food processed in this nest helps the swarm withstand the effects of cold-bloodedness, and its soft texture is also enjoyable for non-insect colonists.
LanguageData.ARA_BioforgeIncubator_Thing.label: Item Incubation Pool
LanguageData.ARA_BioforgeIncubator_Thing.description: A large incubation facility that consumes a large amount of nutrients. It can simultaneously hatch multiple items, and efficiency can be increased by linking it with external equipment.
LanguageData.ARA_BioforgeIncubator.label: Overseer Incubation Pool
LanguageData.ARA_BioforgeIncubator.description: A large incubation facility that consumes a large amount of nutrients. It can simultaneously hatch multiple units, and efficiency can be increased by linking it with external equipment.
LanguageData.ARA_MorphableResearchBench.label: Arachnae Weaver Seat
LanguageData.ARA_MorphableResearchBench.description: A living structure formed around an Arachnae Weaver-type insect, essential for the swarm's advanced research. This structure cannot be constructed and is only obtainable through the Arachnae Weaver's transformation.
LanguageData.ARA_JellyVat.label: Biomass Fermentation Vat
LanguageData.ARA_JellyVat.description: Arachnae insect living tissue. It utilizes the dissolving ability of a living giant fungus to digest biomass and secrete nutrient-rich Arachnae Insect Honey.
LanguageData.ARA_Carapace_Productor.label: Bone Flower
LanguageData.ARA_Carapace_Productor.description: Arachnae insect living tissue. It utilizes the catalytic ability of a living giant fungus to convert steel into chitin.
